chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (f1 f2 f3 : R -> R -> R) (x y l1x l1y l2x l2y l3x l3y : R), differentiable_pt_lim f1 (f2 x y) (f3 x y) l1x l1y -> differentiable_pt_lim f2 x y l2x l2y -> differentiable_pt_lim f3 x y l3x l3y -> differentiable_pt_lim (fun u v : R => f1 (f2 u v) (f3 u v)) x y (l1x * l2x + l1y * l3x) (l1x * l2y + l1y * l3y)

Premises:
ClassicalFacts.f1 : forall A B : Prop, ClassicalFacts.retract A B -> A -> B
ClassicalFacts.f2 : forall A B : Prop, ClassicalFacts.retract A B -> B -> A
differentiable_pt_lim = fun (f : R -> R -> R) (x y lx ly : R) => forall eps : posreal, locally_2d (fun u v : R => Rabs (f u v - f x y - (lx * (u - x) + ly * (v - y))) <= eps * Rmax (Rabs (u - x)) (Rabs (v - y))) x y : (R -> R -> R) -> R -> R -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope R_scope R_scope]
*** [ R : Set ]
differentiable_pt_lim_ext : forall (f1 f2 : R -> R -> R) (x y lx ly : R), locally_2d (fun u v : R => f1 u v = f2 u v) x y -> differentiable_pt_lim f1 x y lx ly -> differentiable_pt_lim f2 x y lx ly
filterdiff_differentiable_pt_lim : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (x y lx ly : R), filterdiff (fun u : R * R => f (fst u) (snd u)) (locally (x, y)) (fun u : R * R => fst u * lx + snd u * ly) < -> differentiable_pt_lim f x y lx ly
formule : forall (x h l1 l2 : R) (f1 f2 : R -> R), h <> 0 -> f2 x <> 0 ->...-> (f1 (x + h) / f2 (x + h) - f1 x / f2 x) / h - (l1 * f2 x - l2 * f1 x) / (f2 x)² = / f2 (x + h) * ((f1 (x + h) - f1 x) / h - l1) + l1 / (f2 x * f2 (x + h)) * (f2 x - f2 (x + h)) - f1 x / (f2 x * f2 (x + h)) * ((f2 (x + h) - f2 x) / h - l2) + l2 * f1 x / ((f2 x)² * f2 (x + h)) * (f2 (x + h) - f2 x)
locally_2d_impl : forall (P Q : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d (fun u v : R => P u v -> Q u v) x y -> locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d Q x y
differentiable_pt_lim_proj1_0 : forall (f : R -> R) (x y l : R), derivable_pt_lim f x l -> differentiable_pt_lim (fun u _ : R => f u) x y l 0
differentiable_pt_lim_proj1_1 : forall (f : R -> R) (x y l : R), differentiable_pt_lim (fun u _ : R => f u) x y l 0 -> derivable_pt_lim f x l
derivable_pt_lim_mult : forall (f1 f2 : R -> R) (x l1 l2 : R), derivable_pt_lim f1 x l1 -> derivable_pt_lim f2 x l2 -> derivable_pt_lim (f1 * f2) x (l1 * f2 x + f1 x * l2)
locally_2d_forall : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), (forall u v : R, P u v) -> locally_2d P x y
differentiable_pt_lim_unique : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (x y lx ly : R), differentiable_pt_lim f x y lx ly -> Derive (fun x0 : R => f x0 y) x = lx /\ Derive (fun y0 : R => f x y0) y = ly
derive_pt_mult : forall (f1 f2 : R -> R) (x : R) (pr1 : derivable_pt f1 x) (pr2 : derivable_pt f2 x), derive_pt (f1 * f2) x (derivable_pt_mult f1 f2 x pr1 pr2) = derive_pt f1 x pr1 * f2 x + f1 x * derive_pt f2 x pr2
derivable_pt_mult : forall (f1 f2 : R -> R) (x : R), derivable_pt f1 x -> derivable_pt f2 x -> derivable_pt (f1 * f2) x
derivable_pt_plus : forall (f1 f2 : R -> R) (x : R), derivable_pt f1 x -> derivable_pt f2 x -> derivable_pt (f1 + f2) x
derive_pt_plus : forall (f1 f2 : R -> R) (x : R) (pr1 : derivable_pt f1 x) (pr2 : derivable_pt f2 x), derive_pt (f1 + f2) x (derivable_pt_plus f1 f2 x pr1 pr2) = derive_pt f1 x pr1 + derive_pt f2 x pr2
mult_fct = fun (f1 f2 : R -> R) (x : R) => f1 x * f2 x : (R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> R -> R Argument scopes are [Rfun_scope Rfun_scope R_scope]
plus_fct = fun (f1 f2 : R -> R) (x : R) => f1 x + f2 x : (R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> R -> R Argument scopes are [Rfun_scope Rfun_scope R_scope]
differentiable_pt = fun (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R) => exists lx ly : R, differentiable_pt_lim f x y lx ly : (R -> R -> R) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
locally_2d = fun (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R) => exists delta : posreal, forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < delta -> Rabs (v - y) < delta -> P u v : (R -> R -> Prop) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
yr = fun x y theta : R => - x * sin theta + y * cos theta : R -> R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope R_scope]
locally_2d_locally : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y < -> locally (x, y) (fun z : prod_UniformSpace R_UniformSpace R_UniformSpace => P (fst z) (snd z))
locally_2d_singleton : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> P x y
Dmult : forall (D : R -> Prop) (df dg f g : R -> R) (x0 : R), D_in f df D x0 -> D_in g dg D x0 -> D_in (fun x : R => f x * g x) (fun x : R => df x * g x + f x * dg x) D x0
antiderivative_P1 : forall (f g F G : R -> R) (l a b : R), antiderivative f F a b -> antiderivative g G a b -> antiderivative (fun x : R => l * f x + g x) (fun x : R => l * F x + G x) a b
Rmin = fun x y : R => if Rle_dec x y then x else y : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
Rmax = fun x y : R => if Rle_dec x y then y else x : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
Rmax_right : forall x y : R, x <= y -> Rmax x y = y
Rmax_left : forall x y : R, y <= x -> Rmax x y = x
minus = fun (G : AbelianGroup) (x y : G) => plus x (opp y) : forall G : AbelianGroup, G -> G -> G Argument G is implicit and maximally inserted
StepFun_P19 : forall (l1 : Rlist) (f g : R -> R) (l : R), Int_SF (FF l1 (fun x : R => f x + l * g x)) l1 = Int_SF (FF l1 f) l1 + l * Int_SF (FF l1 g) l1
filterdiff = fun (K : AbsRing) (U V : NormedModule K) (f : U -> V) (F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) (l : U -> V) => is_linear l /\ (forall x : U, is_filter_lim F x -> Equiv.is_domin F (fun y : U => minus y x) (fun y : U => minus (minus (f y) (f x)) (l (minus y x)))) : forall (K : AbsRing) (U V : NormedModule K), (U -> V) -> ((U -> Prop) -> Prop) -> (U -> V) -> Prop Arguments K, U, V are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ _ function_scope function_scope function_scope]
StepFun_P26 : forall (a b l : R) (f g : R -> R) (l1 : Rlist), is_subdivision f a b l1 -> is_subdivision g a b l1 -> is_subdivision (fun x : R => f x + l * g x) a b l1
